source_sentence: 「憍尸迦！
translation: "Kauśika!

source_sentence: 是菩薩摩訶薩自修無忘失法，教他修無忘失法，讚說無忘失法法，歡喜讚歎修無忘失法者；自修恒住捨性，教他修恒住捨性，讚說恒住捨性法，歡喜讚歎修恒住捨性者。
translation: This is the bodhisattva Mahāsattva who cultivates the Dharma of no forgetfulness on his own, teaches others to cultivate the Dharma of no forgetfulness, praises the Dharma of no forgetfulness, and rejoices in and praises those who cultivate the Dharma of no forgetfulness; he cultivates the nature of constancy and equanimity on his own, teaches others to cultivate the nature of constancy and equanimity, praises the Dharma of constancy and equanimity, and rejoices in and praises those who cultivate the nature of constancy and equanimity.

source_sentence: 「憍尸迦！
translation: "Kauśika!

source_sentence: 是菩薩摩訶薩自修一切陀羅尼門，教他修一切陀羅尼門，讚說一切陀羅尼門法，歡喜讚歎修一切陀羅尼門者；自修一切三摩地門，教他修一切三摩地門，讚說一切三摩地門法，歡喜讚歎修一切三摩地門者。
translation: This is the bodhisattva Mahāsattva who cultivates all dhāraṇīs on his own, teaches others to cultivate all dhāraṇīs, praises all dhāraṇī teachings, and rejoices and praises those who cultivate all dhāraṇī teachings, and cultivates all samādhi teachings on his own, teaches others to cultivate all samādhi teachings, praises all samādhi teachings, and rejoices and praises those who cultivate all samādhi teachings.

source_sentence: 「憍尸迦！
translation: "Kauśika!

source_sentence: 是菩薩摩訶薩自修一切智，教他修一切智，讚說一切智法，歡喜讚歎修一切智者；自修道相智，教他修道相智，讚說道相智法，歡喜讚歎修道相智者；自修一切相智，教他修一切相智，讚說一切相智法，歡喜讚歎修一切相智者。
translation: This is the bodhisattva Mahāsattva who cultivates omniscience, teaches others to cultivate omniscience, praises the teaching of omniscience, and rejoices in the praise of those who cultivate omniscience; who cultivates knowledge of the way, teaches others to cultivate knowledge of the way, praises the teaching of knowledge of the way, and rejoices in the praise of those who cultivate knowledge of the way; and who cultivates knowledge of all characteristics, teaches others to cultivate knowledge of all characteristics, praises the teaching of knowledge of all characteristics, and rejoices in the praise of those who cultivate knowledge of all characteristics.

source_sentence: 「憍尸迦！
translation: "Kauśika!

source_sentence: 是菩薩摩訶薩行六波羅蜜多時，所行布施波羅蜜多，以無所得為方便，與一切有情同共迴向阿耨多羅三藐三菩提；所護淨戒波羅蜜多，以無所得為方便，與一切有情同共迴向阿耨多羅三藐三菩提；所修安忍波羅蜜多，以無所得為方便，與一切有情同共迴向阿耨多羅三藐三菩提；所起精進波羅蜜多，以無所得為方便，與一切有情同共迴向阿耨多羅三藐三菩提；所入靜慮波羅蜜多，以無所得為方便，與一切有情同共迴向阿耨多羅三藐三菩提；所學般若波羅蜜多，以無所得為方便，與一切有情同共迴向阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。
translation: 是菩薩摩訶薩行六波羅蜜多時，所行布施波羅蜜多，以無所得為方便，與一切有情同共迴向阿耨多羅三藐三菩提；所護淨戒波羅蜜多，以無所得為方便，與一切有情同共迴向阿耨多羅三藐三菩提；所修安忍波羅蜜多，以無所得為方便，與一切有情同共迴向阿耨多羅三藐三菩提；所起精進波羅蜜多，以無所得為方便，與一切有情同共迴向阿耨多羅三藐三菩提；所入靜慮波羅蜜多，以無所得為方便，與一切有情同共迴向阿耨多羅三藐三菩提；所學般若波羅蜜多，以無所得為方便，與一切有情同共迴向阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。

source_sentence: 「憍尸迦！
translation: "Kauśika!

source_sentence: 是菩薩摩訶薩行六波羅蜜多時，常作是念：『我若不行布施波羅蜜多，當生貧賤家尚無勢力，何由成熟有情、嚴淨佛土？
translation: When this bodhisattva Mahāsattva practices the six perfections, he always thinks, 'If I don't practice the perfection of generosity, I won't have the strength to be born into a poor or humble family, so how will I be able to ripen sentient beings and glorify the Buddha's land?'

source_sentence: 況當能得一切智智！
translation: How much more so when one can attain omniscience!

source_sentence: 我若不護淨戒波羅蜜多，當生諸惡趣，尚不能得下賤人身，何由成熟有情、嚴淨佛土？
translation: If I don't protect the perfection of pure morality, I'll be born in the bad destinies, and I won't yet be able to attain a lowly existence, so how can I ripen sentient beings and purify the Buddha's land?

source_sentence: 況當能得一切智智！
translation: How much more so when one can attain omniscience!

source_sentence: 我若不修安忍波羅蜜多，當諸根殘缺容貌醜陋，不具菩薩圓滿色身，若得菩薩圓滿色身行菩薩行，有情見者必獲無上正等菩提，若不得此圓滿色身，則不能成熟一切有情、嚴淨佛土，況當能得一切智智！
translation: If I don't cultivate the perfection of patience, my faculties will be crippled and my appearance ugly, and I won't have the full-bodied bodhisattva body; if I attain the full-bodied bodhisattva body and perform the bodhisattva practices, sentient beings who see it will surely attain unsurpassed perfect enlightenment; if I don't attain the full-bodied bodhisattva body, then I won't be able to ripen all sentient beings and adorn the Buddha-lands, much less attain the knowledge of all cognition!

source_sentence: 我若懈怠不起精進波羅蜜多，尚不能獲菩薩勝道，何由成熟一切有情、嚴淨佛土？
translation: If I'm lazy and don't undertake the perfection of effort, how can I ripen all sentient beings and purify the Buddha's land when I'm still unable to attain the bodhisattva's excellent path?

source_sentence: 況當能得一切智智！
translation: How much more so when one can attain omniscience!

source_sentence: 我若心亂不入靜慮波羅蜜多，尚不能起菩薩勝定，何由成熟有情、嚴淨佛土？
translation: If my mind is distracted and I don't enter the perfection of meditation, how can I ripen sentient beings and purify the Buddha-lands when I'm still unable to achieve the bodhisattva's superior concentration?

source_sentence: 況當能得一切智智！
translation: How much more so when one can attain omniscience!

source_sentence: 我若無智不學般若波羅蜜多，尚不能得諸巧便慧超二乘地，何由成熟有情、嚴淨佛土？
translation: If I lack knowledge and don't train in the perfection of wisdom, how can I ripen sentient beings and purify the Buddha's land when I haven't yet attained the wisdom of skillful means to transcend the two-vehicle stage?

source_sentence: 況當能得一切智智！』
translation: How much more so when one can attain the knowledge of all knowables!'

source_sentence: 「憍尸迦！
translation: "Kauśika!

source_sentence: 是菩薩摩訶薩學六波羅蜜多，常作是念：『我不應隨慳貪勢力，若隨彼力則我布施波羅蜜多不得圓滿，若我布施波羅蜜多不圓滿者，終不能成一切智智；我不應隨破戒勢力，若隨彼力則我淨戒波羅蜜多不得圓滿，若我淨戒波羅蜜多不圓滿者，終不能成一切智智；我不應隨忿恚勢力，若隨彼力則我安忍波羅蜜多不得圓滿，若我安忍波羅蜜多不圓滿者，終不能成一切智智；我不應隨懈怠勢力，若隨彼力則我精進波羅蜜多不得圓滿，若我精進波羅蜜多不圓滿者，終不能成一切智智；我不應隨心亂勢力，若隨彼力則我靜慮波羅蜜多不得圓滿，若我靜慮波羅蜜多不圓滿者，終不能成一切智智；我不應隨無智勢力，若隨彼力則我般若波羅蜜多不得圓滿，若我般若波羅蜜多不圓滿者，終不能成一切智智。』
translation: 是菩薩摩訶薩學六波羅蜜多，常作是念：『我不應隨慳貪勢力，若隨彼力則我布施波羅蜜多不得圓滿，若我布施波羅蜜多不圓滿者，終不能成一切智智；我不應隨破戒勢力，若隨彼力則我淨戒波羅蜜多不得圓滿，若我淨戒波羅蜜多不圓滿者，終不能成一切智智；我不應隨忿恚勢力，若隨彼力則我安忍波羅蜜多不得圓滿，若我安忍波羅蜜多不圓滿者，終不能成一切智智；我不應隨懈怠勢力，若隨彼力則我精進波羅蜜多不得圓滿，若我精進波羅蜜多不圓滿者，終不能成一切智智；我不應隨心亂勢力，若隨彼力則我靜慮波羅蜜多不得圓滿，若我靜慮波羅蜜多不圓滿者，終不能成一切智智；我不應隨無智勢力，若隨彼力則我般若波羅蜜多不得圓滿，若我般若波羅蜜多不圓滿者，終不能成一切智智。』

source_sentence: 憍尸迦！
translation: Kauśika!

source_sentence: 是菩薩摩訶薩不離一切智智心，以無所得為方便，於此般若波羅蜜多，受持、讀誦、精勤修學、如理思惟、書寫、解說、廣令流布，獲得如是現法後法功德勝利。」
translation: This is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva who, without departing from the mind of omniscience and knowledge, takes the method of obtaining nothing, retains, recites, diligently cultivates, correctly contemplates, writes, interprets, and widely disseminates this prajñāpāramitā, and obtains the merits and benefits of such a present and subsequent teaching."

source_sentence: 爾時，天帝釋白佛言：「世尊！
translation: It was then that Śakra Devānām-Indra said to the Buddha, "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 如是般若波羅蜜多甚為希有，調伏菩薩令不高心，而能迴向一切智智。」
translation: Such prajñāpāramitā is rare, disciplining bodhisattvas so that they don't become arrogant and are able to dedicate themselves to the knowledge of all things."

source_sentence: 佛言：「憍尸迦！
translation: The Buddha said, "Kauśika!

source_sentence: 云何般若波羅蜜多調伏菩薩令不高心，而能迴向一切智智？」
translation: How does the prajñāpāramitā tame bodhisattvas so that they don't become arrogant and can instead turn toward omniscience and cognition?"

source_sentence: 天帝釋言：「世尊！
translation: The emperor explained, "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 菩薩摩訶薩行世間布施波羅蜜多時，若於佛所而行布施，便作是念：『我能施佛。』
translation: When the bodhisattva Mahāsattva practices the perfection of worldly giving, if he makes an offering to a Buddha, then he thinks, 'I can give to the Buddha.'

source_sentence: 若於菩薩、獨覺、聲聞、孤窮、老病、道行、乞者而行布施，便作是念：『我能施菩薩、獨覺、聲聞、孤窮、老病、道行、乞者。』
translation: If he gives alms to a bodhisattva, a solitary realizer, a direct disciple, an elderly person, a practitioner of the Way, or a beggar, then he thinks, 'I can give to bodhisattvas, solitary realizers, direct disciples, the elderly, the sick, practitioners of the Way, and beggars.'

source_sentence: 是菩薩摩訶薩無方便善巧行布施故，遂起高心不能迴向一切智智。
translation: Because the bodhisattva Mahāsattva doesn't practice almsgiving skillfully, he then arises with a lofty attitude and can't dedicate himself to the knowledge of all things.

source_sentence: 菩薩摩訶薩行世間淨戒波羅蜜多時，便作是念：『我能行淨戒波羅蜜多，我能滿淨戒波羅蜜多。』
translation: When the bodhisattva Mahāsattva practices the worldly pāramitā of pure precepts, he then thinks, 'I can practice the pāramitā of pure precepts, and I can fulfill the pāramitā of pure precepts.'

source_sentence: 是菩薩摩訶薩無方便善巧行淨戒故，遂起高心不能迴向一切智智。
translation: Because the bodhisattva-mahāsattva doesn't practice the pure precepts skillfully and skillfully, he then arises an attitude of pride that prevents him from dedicating himself to the knowledge of all things.

source_sentence: 菩薩摩訶薩行世間安忍波羅蜜多時，便作是念：『我能行安忍波羅蜜多，我能滿安忍波羅蜜多。』
translation: When the bodhisattva Mahāsattva practices the perfection of worldly patience, he then thinks, 'I can practice the perfection of patience, and I can fulfill the perfection of patience.'

source_sentence: 是菩薩摩訶薩無方便善巧行安忍故，遂起高心不能迴向一切智智。
translation: Because the bodhisattva Mahāsattva doesn't practice the perfection of forbearance with skillful means, he then arises an attitude of pride that prevents him from dedicating himself to the knowledge of all things.

source_sentence: 菩薩摩訶薩行世間精進波羅蜜多時，便作是念：『我能行精進波羅蜜多，我能滿精進波羅蜜多。』
translation: When the bodhisattva Mahāsattva practices the perfection of worldly effort, he then thinks, 'I can practice the perfection of effort, and I can fulfill the perfection of effort.'

source_sentence: 是菩薩摩訶薩無方便善巧行精進故，遂起高心不能迴向一切智智。
translation: Because the bodhisattva Mahāsattva doesn't perform the effort with skillful means, he then arises from a high attitude and can't dedicate himself to the knowledge of all things.

source_sentence: 菩薩摩訶薩行世間靜慮波羅蜜多時，便作是念：『我能行靜慮波羅蜜多，我能滿靜慮波羅蜜多。』
translation: When the bodhisattva Mahāsattva practices the perfection of worldly meditation, he then thinks, 'I can practice the perfection of meditation, and I can fulfill the perfection of meditation.'

source_sentence: 是菩薩摩訶薩無方便善巧行靜慮故，遂起高心不能迴向一切智智。
translation: Because the bodhisattva Mahāsattva doesn't skillfully practice meditation with skillful means, he then arises an attitude of pride that prevents him from dedicating himself to the knowledge of all things.

source_sentence: 菩薩摩訶薩行世間般若波羅蜜多時，便作是念：『我能行般若波羅蜜多，我能滿般若波羅蜜多。』
translation: When the bodhisattva Mahāsattva practices the perfection of worldly wisdom, he then thinks, 'I can practice the perfection of wisdom, and I can fulfill the perfection of wisdom.'

source_sentence: 是菩薩摩訶薩無方便善巧行般若故，遂起高心不能迴向一切智智。
translation: Because the bodhisattva Mahāsattva doesn't practice prajñā with skillful means, he then arises with a lofty attitude that prevents him from dedicating himself to the knowledge of all things.

source_sentence: 「世尊！
translation: "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 菩薩摩訶薩住內空時，若作是念：『我能住內空。』
translation: "When a bodhisattva Mahāsattva abides in internal emptiness, if he thinks, 'I can abide in internal emptiness.'

source_sentence: 是菩薩摩訶薩我、我所執之所擾亂住內空故，遂起高心不能迴向一切智智。
translation: It's because the bodhisattva-mahāsattva's attachment to self and mine disturbs him from abiding in internal emptiness that he gives rise to an elevated state of mind that's unable to turn toward omniscience and cognition.

source_sentence: 菩薩摩訶薩住外空、內外空、空空、大空、勝義空、有為空、無為空、畢竟空、無際空、散空、無變異空、本性空、自相空、共相空、一切法空、不可得空、無性空、自性空、無性自性空時，若作是念：『我能住外空乃至無性自性空。』
translation: When the bodhisattva Mahāsattva abides in external emptiness, internal and external emptiness, emptiness, great emptiness, ultimate emptiness, existent emptiness, impermanent emptiness, dispersed emptiness, immutable emptiness, intrinsic emptiness, emptiness of own-nature, emptiness of shared characteristics, emptiness of all things, inaccessible emptiness, natureless emptiness, self-nature emptiness, and natureless self-nature emptiness, then he thinks, 'I can abide in external emptiness ... and even natureless self-nature emptiness.'

source_sentence: 是菩薩摩訶薩我、我所執之所擾亂住外空乃至無性自性空故，遂起高心不能迴向一切智智。
translation: Because the bodhisattva Mahāsattva is distracted by attachment to self and what's self, he abides in external emptiness ... [and] the emptiness of the natureless nature of self, he then arises with a high attitude and can't turn back to omniscience and cognition.

source_sentence: 「世尊！
translation: "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 菩薩摩訶薩住真如時，若作是念：『我能住真如。』
translation: "When a bodhisattva Mahāsattva abides in true thusness, suppose he thinks, 'I can abide in true thusness.'

source_sentence: 是菩薩摩訶薩我、我所執之所擾亂住真如故，遂起高心不能迴向一切智智。
translation: It's because the bodhisattva Mahāsattva's attachment to self and I disturbs him from abiding in true reality that he gives rise to an elevated state of mind that's incapable of turning back to omniscience and cognition.

source_sentence: 菩薩摩訶薩住法界、法性、不虛妄性、不變異性、平等性、離生性、法定、法住、實際、虛空界、不思議界時，若作是念：『我能住法界乃至不思議界。』
translation: When the bodhisattva Mahāsattva abides in the Dharma realm, Dharma nature, non-falsity, unchanging and dissimilar nature, equality, freedom from arising, legality, Dharma abiding, reality, the space realm, and the inconceivable realm, if he thinks, 'I can abide in the Dharma realm ... and even the inconceivable realm.'

source_sentence: 是菩薩摩訶薩我、我所執之所擾亂住法界乃至不思議界故，遂起高心不能迴向一切智智。
translation: Because the bodhisattva Mahāsattva's attachment to self and mine disturbs him from abiding in the Dharma realm ... and even the inconceivable realm, he then arises from a high attitude and can't turn back to omniscience.

source_sentence: 「世尊！
translation: "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 菩薩摩訶薩住苦聖諦時，若作是念：『我能住苦聖諦。』
translation: "When the bodhisattva Mahāsattva abides in the noble truth of suffering, suppose he thinks, 'I can abide in the noble truth of suffering.'

source_sentence: 是菩薩摩訶薩我、我所執之所擾亂住苦聖諦故，遂起高心不能迴向一切智智。
translation: Because the bodhisattva-mahāsattva's attachment to self and what's self disturbs him as he abides in the noble truth of suffering, he then arises with a high attitude and can't turn toward the knowledge of all knowables.

source_sentence: 菩薩摩訶薩住集、滅、道聖諦時，若作是念：『我能住集、滅、道聖諦。』
translation: When the bodhisattva Mahāsattva abides in the noble truths of accumulation, cessation, and the path, suppose he thinks, 'I can abide in the noble truths of accumulation, cessation, and the path.'

source_sentence: 是菩薩摩訶薩我、我所執之所擾亂住集、滅、道聖諦故，遂起高心不能迴向一切智智。
translation: Because the bodhisattva Mahāsattva's attachment to self and mine disturbs him from abiding in the noble truths of accumulation, cessation, and the path, he then arises with a lofty mind that's unable to turn toward the knowledge of all knowables.

source_sentence: 「世尊！
translation: "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 菩薩摩訶薩修四靜慮時，若作是念：『我能修四靜慮。』
translation: "When a bodhisattva-mahāsattva cultivates the four meditations, if he thinks, 'I can cultivate the four meditations.'

source_sentence: 是菩薩摩訶薩我、我所執之所擾亂修四靜慮故，遂起高心不能迴向一切智智。
translation: Because the bodhisattva-mahāsattva's attachment to self and what's self disturbs him as he cultivates the four meditations, he then becomes high-spirited and can't turn toward omniscience.

source_sentence: 菩薩摩訶薩修四無量、四無色定時，若作是念：『我能修四無量、四無色定。』
translation: If the bodhisattva Mahāsattva cultivates the four immeasurable and four formless concentrations while cultivating them, he thinks, 'I can cultivate the four immeasurable and four formless concentrations.'
